price: Wọ́n sọ pé: “Báyẹn ni Olúwa rẹ sọ. Dájúdájú Òun ni Ọlọ́gbọ́n, Onímọ̀.”
arabic: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū kadhāliki qāla rabbuki innahu huwa al-ḥakīmu al-ʿalīmu
